title: Big Sound Without the Big Price: Anker Soundcore Boom 2 Speaker Is 36% Off
description: Every day, we head into the deal mines, digging for savings and discounts on the best electronics out there. And every day, there's one deal that stands above the rest. This is that deal!
content:
The Anker Soundcore Boom 2 delivers room-filling sound, eye-catching lights, and rugged portability for $89.99 with today's 36% discount. With waterproof construction, a floating design, and up to 24 hours of playtime, it’s built for long days by the pool or lively backyard gatherings. You’re getting serious bass power and a dynamic light show without spending more on , making this a solid choice if you want big sound and bold style in one portable package.

This speaker is perfect if you love hosting or want music that keeps up with your adventures. Whether you’re throwing an outdoor barbecue, heading to a lakeside picnic, or setting the vibe for a late-night hangout, the Boom 2 delivers both volume and personality. The built-in handle makes it easy to grab and go, while its waterproof build means you can relax if it gets splashed. That’s why, PCMag’s audio expert gave it an “Excellent” rating in our .

With 80 watts of output from its dual 15W tweeters and 50W woofer, you’ll get vibrant, detailed sound across a wide frequency range. The Bass Up mode adds extra depth for tracks that thrive on low-end thump, making EDM, hip-hop, and pop tracks hit harder. LED panels on each side sync to the beat, creating a fun, animated backdrop for your music, while the customizable EQ in the Soundcore app lets you fine-tune the sound to your taste. Bluetooth 5.3 ensures a stable connection, and the built-in mic offers clear speakerphone calls. Whether you’re after thumping bass, visual flair, or all-day portability, the Boom 2 combines it all in a package that’s as ready for the water as it is for the dance floor.
summary: The Anker Soundcore Boom 2 Speaker, which delivers room-filling sound, eye-catching lights, and rugged portability for $89.99 with a 36% discount, is designed for long days at the pool or backyard gatherings. The waterproof construction, floating design, and up to 24 hours of playtime are all reasons for the speaker's versatility. PCMag's audio expert gave it an "Excellent" rating in their review. The speaker also features a Bass Up mode for low-end music and a dynamic light show.
shortSummary: Anker Soundcore Boom 2 offers robust, multifunctional sound and rugged portability, with dual tweeters and a dynamic light display.

argos_summary: The Anker Soundcore Boom 2 is a portable speaker priced at $89.99, featuring waterproof construction, a floating design, and up to 24 hours of playtime, making it ideal for outdoor gatherings. It offers powerful sound with 80 watts of output, customizable EQ settings, and a dynamic light show that syncs to the music. With its rugged design and built-in handle, it's perfect for music lovers who enjoy hosting events or outdoor adventures.
